game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Explore the ancient ruins and uncover the secrets of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep within the nearby forest, filled with treasures and artifacts from a long-lost civilization. Your quest is to find this fabled city and unlock its secrets.
game.reward: A chest containing 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet granting resistance to poison.

task.objective: Gather information about the location of Eldarath from the village locals.
task.description: Talk to the villagers and gather any clues or rumors that might lead you to the lost city. Be careful, as some may be reluctant to share their knowledge.

task.objective: Retrieve an ancient map from the nearby ruins of a old castle.
task.description: Beware of traps and creatures as you navigate through the crumbling halls. The map is said to be hidden in a chest on the upper floors.
task.location: The old castle ruins, east wing

task.objective: Decipher the ancient symbols and markings on the map.
task.description: Study the symbols and markings on the map to uncover the location of Eldarath. This may require some knowledge of ancient languages or cryptic puzzle-solving.
task.location: A quiet, secluded spot with good lighting

task.objective: Explore the lost city and uncover its secrets.
task.description: Beware of ancient traps and guardians as you delve deeper into the heart of Eldarath. Uncover the secrets of the city and claim your reward.
